page.title: 19LOCAL NEWS
page.content: The main news recently in Folly Gate was that the{Crossways Inn}has been re-opened after being closed for over a year and a half. As the pub is the main meeting place for people in{Folly {Gate}the people were very pleased to see it opened again. The morning after the pub re-opened one of the local farmers went to collect his cows for milking and when some of them got up to walk they seemed drunk. They called the vet and he said it was the sugar in the grass formenting not the result of the pub re-opening! Folly Gate is on the main{Holiday {Route}and this makes the road very busy in the summer so it has been widened during the last year and a footpath has been constructed to improve safety while walking along the road.
